title: Plum sponge pudding
ingredients: ['570g can red plums in syrup, drained, halved and stoned (about 250g stoned fruit)', '100g butter, softened', '75g caster sugar', '75g self-raising flour, sifted', '1 tsp baking powder, sifted with the flour', '75g ground almonds', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '2 tbsp demerara sugar']
